description: Tools for monitoring security alerts and threats

tools.name: get_active_security_alerts
tools.description: Retrieves all active security alerts and incidents currently requiring attention, with severity levels and timestamps

severity_filter.description: Filter alerts by severity level (critical, high, medium, low)

time_range_hours.description: Number of hours back to search for alerts (default: 24)

tools.name: scan_vulnerability_status
tools.description: Checks for known vulnerabilities across systems and applications, including CVE details and patch status

asset_type.description: Type of assets to scan (servers, workstations, network_devices, applications, all)

cvss_min_score.description: Minimum CVSS score to include in results (0.0-10.0)

tools.name: check_threat_intelligence_feeds
tools.description: Queries threat intelligence sources for indicators of compromise (IoCs) and active threats targeting the organization

threat_types.description: Specific types of threats to check for

include_industry_specific.description: Include threats specifically targeting your industry sector

tools.name: get_security_compliance_status
tools.description: Reviews current security compliance status and identifies any configuration drift or policy violations requiring immediate attention

compliance_framework.description: Specific compliance framework to check (iso27001, nist, pci_dss, hipaa, gdpr, all)

show_violations_only.description: Only return items that are out of compliance (default: true)
